product_name: Novara Summerhill Bike Capri Pants - Women's
long_description: The women's Novara Summerhill Capri Pants might look like casual straight-leg capris, but they are definitely built to bike in, thanks to stretch, wind-resistant fabric and reflective trim. Nylon/spandex fabric offers 2-way stretch and UPF 50+ sun protection. Summerhill capris resist wind and rain and dry quickly. Higher rise in back provides coverage while riding. Roll-up cuffs and rear pocket flaps let you deploy or hide the reflective trim. Strong loop on back waist holds a U-lock. Novara Summerhill Capri Pants feature a comfort gusset and multiple pockets.
